titleStmt.title: Bonduca, or, The British heroine a tragedy, acted at the Theatre Royal by His Majesty's servants, with a new entertainment of musick, vocal and instrumental : never printed or acted before.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
Purcell, Henry, 1659-1695. Bonduca.
Powell, George, 1658?-1714.

notesStmt.note: An alteration of Fletcher's play, "the two first acts new writ", given to George Powell for publication. Cf. Dedication and "To the reader".
Reproduction of original in Princeton University Library.
